EmailTemplate.name: welive-tour-confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Tour Confirmation: WeLive {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_With__c}, You're all set for a tour at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Building_No_City__c} on {!Tour_Outcome__c.Tour_Date__c} at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Start_Time__c}!
You can find us at {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Address__c}. {!Tour_Outcome__c.Location_Special_Instructions__c}.
If you have any questions prior to your arrival, feel free to email or give us a call at 888-977-4184. If for whatever reason you are unable to make it, please let us know and we will be happy to reschedule!
We're looking forward to your visit!
The WeLive Team
